briefTitle: Safety and Efficacy Study of Aztreonam for Inhalation Solution (AZLI) in Patients With Cystic Fibrosis, Mild Lung Disease, and P. Aeruginosa
officialTitle: A Double-Blind, Multicenter, Multinational, Randomized, Placebo-Controlled Trial Evaluating Aztreonam Lysine For Inhalation in Patients With Cystic Fibrosis, Mild Lung Disease, and P. Aeruginosa (AIR-CF4)
summary: The purpose of this study was to evaluate the safety and efficacy of a 28-day course of aztreonam for inhalation solution (AZLI) in patients with cystic fibrosis (CF), mild lung disease (forced expiratory volume in 1 second \[FEV1\] \>75% predicted, and Pseudomonas aeruginosa (PA) infection.

primaryOutcome.measure: Change From Baseline in Cystic Fibrosis Questionnaire - Revised (CFQ-R) Respiratory Symptoms Scale (RSS) Score at Day 28
